TopicTitle: Not able to read planted flag

Articles.Content:
When you plant a flag there is no possibility to read the flag

_______________________________________________________________
game version:
0.1.1.0.21572

OS:
Windows 11

GPU:
NVIDIA Geforce RTX 3090

CPU:
Intel(R) Core(TM) i9-12900K   3.20 GHz
I can confirm, which is a bit a shame as the only job of a flag is to be read
Flags are basically useless at the moment. I don't even think they show up on the map/tracking station
You cant even type numbers in the title, but it gives you the option to plant it on your craft if you walk on it. But it doesn't let you.
